inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBonus('OneHandedMeleeWeaponDamage', 'Stackable', 15); effect.getBonuses().addBonus('TwoHandedMeleeWeaponDamage', 'Stackable', 15); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Bruiser
description: You hit harder than others, gaining a permanent +15 bonus to damage with melee weapons (except light melee weapons).
